messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Digest Number 1814
messages.msgSnippet: I haven t posted here in forever.  I suspect those of you who know me didn t even realize I was still here. :-) ... Just wanted to say that although I haven t
messages.messageBody:
I haven't posted here in forever. I suspect those of you who know me
didn't even realize I was still here. :-)



> I also found a great page full of good answers here:
>
> http://www.lightlink.com/hilinda/philosophy.shtml
>
> Thanks for the suggestions!
>
> LaVonne
>

Just wanted to say that although I haven't had time to make any changes to
my website in a very long time- my entire life has changed in the meantime-
it's nice to know that someone still finds it useful.

For what it's worth, we're still unschooling, the kids are now not quite
15, 12, and about to turn 9. Life is fun, and mostly good, and very, very
busy.


Linda


Linda Wyatt
http://www.lightlink.com/hilinda/index.shtml
Learning everywhere, all the time
Algebra Before Breakfast
